body_html:
@facaiy
It seems that this problem still exists:

File "/Users/szp/anaconda3/envs/dl/lib/python3.6/site-packages/tensorflow/python/keras/_impl/keras/engine/topology.py", line 252, in __call__ output = super(Layer, self).__call__(inputs, **kwargs) File "/Users/szp/anaconda3/envs/dl/lib/python3.6/site-packages/tensorflow/python/layers/base.py", line 575, in __call__ outputs = self.call(inputs, *args, **kwargs) File "/Users/szp/anaconda3/envs/dl/lib/python3.6/site-packages/tensorflow/python/layers/convolutional.py", line 167, in call outputs = self._convolution_op(inputs, self.kernel) File "/Users/szp/anaconda3/envs/dl/lib/python3.6/site-packages/tensorflow/python/ops/nn_ops.py", line 835, in __call__ return self.conv_op(inp, filter) File "/Users/szp/anaconda3/envs/dl/lib/python3.6/site-packages/tensorflow/python/ops/nn_ops.py", line 499, in __call__ return self.call(inp, filter) File "/Users/szp/anaconda3/envs/dl/lib/python3.6/site-packages/tensorflow/python/ops/nn_ops.py", line 187, in __call__ name=self.name) File "/Users/szp/anaconda3/envs/dl/lib/python3.6/site-packages/tensorflow/python/ops/nn_ops.py", line 177, in _conv1d data_format=data_format, name=name) File "/Users/szp/anaconda3/envs/dl/lib/python3.6/site-packages/tensorflow/python/ops/nn_ops.py", line 2204, in conv1d data_format=data_format) File "/Users/szp/anaconda3/envs/dl/lib/python3.6/site-packages/tensorflow/python/ops/gen_nn_ops.py", line 631, in conv2d data_format=data_format, name=name) File "/Users/szp/anaconda3/envs/dl/lib/python3.6/site-packages/tensorflow/python/framework/op_def_library.py", line 691, in _apply_op_helper attr_def.allowed_values.list.s)))) ValueError: Attr 'padding' of 'Conv2D' Op passed string 'CAUSAL' not in: "SAME", "VALID".

It should be a variable declaring that only "SAME" and "VALID" are used.

Is the master branch correct? let me try test it on master branch.

body:
@facaiy 
It seems that this problem still exists:

`  File "/Users/szp/anaconda3/envs/dl/lib/python3.6/site-packages/tensorflow/python/keras/_impl/keras/engine/topology.py", line 252, in __call__
    output = super(Layer, self).__call__(inputs, **kwargs)
  File "/Users/szp/anaconda3/envs/dl/lib/python3.6/site-packages/tensorflow/python/layers/base.py", line 575, in __call__
    outputs = self.call(inputs, *args, **kwargs)
  File "/Users/szp/anaconda3/envs/dl/lib/python3.6/site-packages/tensorflow/python/layers/convolutional.py", line 167, in call
    outputs = self._convolution_op(inputs, self.kernel)
  File "/Users/szp/anaconda3/envs/dl/lib/python3.6/site-packages/tensorflow/python/ops/nn_ops.py", line 835, in __call__
    return self.conv_op(inp, filter)
  File "/Users/szp/anaconda3/envs/dl/lib/python3.6/site-packages/tensorflow/python/ops/nn_ops.py", line 499, in __call__
    return self.call(inp, filter)
  File "/Users/szp/anaconda3/envs/dl/lib/python3.6/site-packages/tensorflow/python/ops/nn_ops.py", line 187, in __call__
    name=self.name)
  File "/Users/szp/anaconda3/envs/dl/lib/python3.6/site-packages/tensorflow/python/ops/nn_ops.py", line 177, in _conv1d
    data_format=data_format, name=name)
  File "/Users/szp/anaconda3/envs/dl/lib/python3.6/site-packages/tensorflow/python/ops/nn_ops.py", line 2204, in conv1d
    data_format=data_format)
  File "/Users/szp/anaconda3/envs/dl/lib/python3.6/site-packages/tensorflow/python/ops/gen_nn_ops.py", line 631, in conv2d
    data_format=data_format, name=name)
  File "/Users/szp/anaconda3/envs/dl/lib/python3.6/site-packages/tensorflow/python/framework/op_def_library.py", line 691, in _apply_op_helper
    attr_def.allowed_values.list.s))))
ValueError: Attr 'padding' of 'Conv2D' Op passed string 'CAUSAL' not in: "SAME", "VALID".`

It should be a variable declaring that only "SAME" and "VALID" are used.

Is the master branch correct? let me try test it on master branch.
